name: Brooklyn the Jumpy Boy
description:
Keep Brooklyn alive by placing platforms and climbing on them as the screen constantly scrolls up. Avoid deadly sawblades and collect coins along the way. 

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

W, Up, or Space to jump.

Left-click to place platforms,

Note: if you cannot move Brooklyn, reload the page. Sometimes he can't be controlled on the first page load.

Built in 4 hours for Trijam #171 using ct.js with built-in assets. (except for blocks, platforms, and room background, which were designed by me during the jam period.)
